solution_line_template: Tip for the hair stylist will be ${hair_updo_cost} x {tip_percent_num}% = $<<{hair_updo_cost}*{tip_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={hair_tip}>>{hair_tip}.
Tip for the manicurist will be ${manicure_cost} x {tip_percent_num}% = $<<{manicure_cost}*{tip_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={manicure_tip}>>{manicure_tip}.
Total for hair and nails is ${hair_updo_cost} + ${manicure_cost} = $<<{hair_updo_cost}+{manicure_cost}={base_cost_services}>>{base_cost_services}.
Total for the two services plus tip is ${base_cost_services} + ${total_tips} = $<<{base_cost_services}+{total_tips}={final_total_cost}>>{final_total_cost}.
